title.rendered: Gaur International School Students Explore World Cinema at SIFFCY’ 24

content.rendered:
As part of its nationwide tour, the Smile International Film Festival for Children and Youth (SIFFCY) 2024 made an exciting stop at Gaurs International School in NOIDA, captivating hundreds of enthusiastic students. This event was one of 100 locations across India where the festival is igniting the imagination of young minds.

Students were introduced to thought-provoking, value-based films that offered fresh perspectives and valuable insights. The event included interactive panel discussions and direct exchanges with filmmakers from around the world, allowing students to gain a deeper understanding of the art of filmmaking and global issues.

The day not only provided entertainment but also fostered education, aligning with SIFFCY’s mission to inspire and empower young minds through the transformative power of cinema.
